amendment.description: To increase the end strength for active duty personnel of the Army for fiscal year 2005 by 20,000 to 502,400.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3352 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 3. Record Vote Number: 129.

action.text: Amendment SA 3352 proposed by Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S6780-6784; text: CR S6780) To increase the end strength for active duty personnel of the Army for fiscal year 2005 by 20,000 to 502,400.
